section.title: Element: Condition
section.simpara: This is a container for a line in a function body that defines a conditional expression.

formalpara.title: Condition contents
formalpara.para: The contents of a Condition element should be a set of Expressions where the first expression is the condition and the rest are part of the consequent. In most cases the consequent should be a single expression, but we allow for multiple expressions in the consequent for the ease of some compiler passes.

formalpara.title: Condition attributes
formalpara.para: The Condition element takes a single comment attribute indicating the comment on the given line.
